name: Sho Madjozi
description: '''Maya Christinah Xichavo Wegerif''' (born 9 May 1992), known professionally as '''Sho Madjozi''' ({{IPAc-en|ʃ|ɒ|'|m|ɑː|dj|ɔːr|z|ɪ}} {{respell|shoh|mah|JOH|zee}}), is a South African rapper, singer, songwriter, and poet. Madjozi incorporates the [[Tsonga people|Tsonga]] culture through her music and public image. In 2019, Madjozi was named as one of [[Forbes|''Forbes'' Africa]]'s 30 Under 30 for her contribution in the music and entertainment sector.
